      • Game

        public Game(Dragon.Dragon_mode dragon_mode,
            boolean defaultGame)
        Creates a game with the following settings: Map generation: default map Hero, sword and dragons position: default positions
        Parameters:
        dragon_mode -
        defaultGame - if false a shield and darts will be generated, otherwise they won't be created

      • Game

        public Game(int side,
            int dragon_number,
            Dragon.Dragon_mode dragon_mode,
            boolean random,
            boolean defaultGame)
        Creates a game with custom settings
        Parameters:
        side - size of the map to be generated (this field will be ignored if the random param is set to false)
        dragon_number -
        dragon_mode -
        random -
        defaultGame - if false a shield and darts will be generated, otherwise they won't be created (this field will be ignored if the random param is set to true)
